FuncDef: The display evpn df-timer state command displays the DF timer status of an EVPN instance.
CLIs: display evpn vpn-instance name <vpn-instance-name> df-timer state

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an EVPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the name of an EVPN instance.
-

Specifies the name of an EVPN instance.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display evpn vpn-instance name aaa df-timer state
<HUAWEI> display evpn vpn-instance name testbd df-timer state
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the DF timer status of an EVPN instance, run the display evpn df-timer state command.
